WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
Rawr.v2.3.22 issue, when i want to set (Ranged Attack Power) Hunters Mark on my Hunter under the BUFF TAB. It deselects every Time again. Can't set it.
 
The only Buff are selected is Master of Anatomy. Shalls like a Joke,, iam a Hunter and cant set Hunters Mark in Rawr...lol
Rawr is set to German Language and items are updated to German. (WoWHead)
Have Attached my saved hunter.
 
Best Regards
 
Dragonangel
Sorry for my english...
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Buff Tab can't set Hunters Mark

Comments.Message: I will look into this later today

Ok, issue replicated, as soon as it's checked it unchecks itself. This wasn't supposed to happen as you needed to be able to select it's improved versions if you weren't supplying them yourself, which as a BM Hunter you wouldn't be.
